bioAsHtml: I'm Restlet's API Mad Scientist, and also a product manager. We build tools to help developers deliver APIs as quickly and easily as possible. In previous roles I was a developer and also a researcher on formal concurrency models.

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: Pourquoi j’ai essayé de faire une API de détection de trolls
